p:
Flavivirus is an arthropod virus transmitted by infected arthropods such as mosquito or tick. In vitro, CsA showed efficacy against several viruses belonging to this genus (dengue virus, West Nile virus, yellow fever virus and Zika virus). The efficacy of CsA is through the inhibition of cyclophilins that interact with the NS5 protein of flavivirus to facilitate protein folding.
61, 62
